abstract: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index range.
overview:
## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with `indexRange`.

## Discussion

This method raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/rangeException] when `indexRange` would add an index that exceeds the maximum allowed value for unsigned integers.

The resulting index set has a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet/firstIndex] equal to the `location` of `indexRange`, and a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet/count] equal to the `length` of `indexRange`. Specifying a zero-length range results in an empty index set.

This method is a designated initializer for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet].

# init(indexesIn:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index range.

## Declaration

```swift
init(indexesIn range: NSRange)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: An index range. Must be in the range `0 .. NSNotFound - 1`..

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with `indexRange`.

## Discussion

This method raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/rangeException] when `indexRange` would add an index that exceeds the maximum allowed value for unsigned integers.

The resulting index set has a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet/firstIndex] equal to the `location` of `indexRange`, and a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet/count] equal to the `length` of `indexRange`. Specifying a zero-length range results in an empty index set.

This method is a designated initializer for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet].

## Creating Index Sets

- **init(index:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index.
- **init(indexSet:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index set.
